hanzi-su-wiki:
級

Значения

Разряд, класс; ранг

Мнемоника

Гражданские чиновники делились на 9 классов, военные — на 7. Каждому из них соответствовал свой цвет и символ — птица для гражданских лиц и зверь для военных. Достичь 及 звания и получить вышивку на одежде цветными нитками 糸.

Варианты

级

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 级)
Pictophonetic: 及 indicates the sound; 糹 (silk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 及 [ jí ] to extend; to reach; and; in time
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman is running out of time while taking the JLPT Level 1, and in desperation he reaches out to grab his friend's answer sheet in order to catch up with him. Looks like this test is above his rank (level) of knowledge.
heisig_constituent: class, thread, spiderman, reach out, outstretched hands
koohiiStory1: This Kanji is the same ones used in the Japanese Language proficiency tests; i.e. ikkyuu (一級) The Kanji doesnt describe class as in a "class of students" or "classroom," but rather a grade of quality or ability. ---------- Spiderman is taking the JLPT Level 1. In desperation he REACHES OUT to grab his friend´s answer sheet next to him, who seems to be doing well. The other test takers are obviously a class above him. Looks like this test is above his class of knowledge.
koohiiStory2: We can almost see the outstreched hands of the lower classes wearing just a few threads in this kanji.
jp_example_words:
階級(かいきゅう): class, rank, grade
等級(とうきゅう): grade, class
同級(どうきゅう): the same grade, same class
学級(がっきゅう): grade in school
級(きゅう): class, grade, rank
高級(こうきゅう): high class, high grade
上級(じょうきゅう): advanced level, high grade, senior
初級(しょきゅう): elementary level
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There are pieces of thread on each escalator showing you what level they go to in your school. Each escalator takes you to a different grade, so make sure you follow the right thread or you'll end up in a class that's either way above or way below your level.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: When you level up your Japanese skills, you'll take this escalator to rank up too!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You want to see what the highest level is, so you go up the wrong escalator. At the top you find a giant cucumber (きゅう).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: A teacher comes over and says, "Excuse me, this is advanced level cucumber studies. I don't think you're at this level yet... please take the escalator down and follow the threads to find your level."
Ru_Radicals: ノ, 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 及 (достигать), 糸 (нить)
Ru_trainchinese:
jí: (сущ) ранг, разряд, уровень; ступень; класс, год обучения (в школе)
jí: (сч.слово) счетное слово для ступени, класса, разряда
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the threads (糸) amount to (及) a class
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Everyone thought that spiderman was so smart because he was top rank in his class.  Really he just reached out and took answers he didn't know from other students' tests when they weren't looking.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "糸" to " and " sound. The original meaning is the rank of silk's superiority and inferiority, and the extension indicates the rank and rank. "Shuowen": "Class, second brother of silk. Congshi, and sound." Duan Yucai's note: "This is the second brother of silk, so the word is from Shi, extended to be the second brother of Fan." Zuo Zhuan. "The Twenty-Three Years of Xi Gong": "Uncle Yi is old, work harder, and give one level, no worship." "Sleeping Tiger Land Qin Bamboo Slips. Qin Law Eighteen Kinds" Jane 155-156: "Those who want to return to the second rank lest their parents become concubines...Xu Zhi, so as not to be subordinates." The redemption is now one of the biological parents of the minister... It is permissible, and the redemption is exempt from being a commoner.

" Class " means stone steps and ranks . "Jade articles. Department": "Class, class." Such as "Book of Rites. "Qu Li Shang": "The host and the guest let the boarding, the host boarded first, the guest followed it, gathered the feet, and continued to step up." Tautology": "It is to make the guest extend and stand up in different grades." Gao Luu's note: "Grade, rank."

" Level " can be used as a quantifier, used in ancient times to count the number of heads cut off. "Zhengzitong. "Itobe": "Level, first level. Qin Fa decapitated many people to enter the first level, because it is called the first level." Such as "Historical Records. "The Family of Zhao": "For nine years, I fought Qin together with Han and Wei, Qin defeated me and beheaded 80,000." "Han Shu. "Zhao Chongguo Xin Qingji Biography": "Strong troops to attack his seed, beheading more than a thousand levels."
humanum_short_description_en: From "糸" to " and " sound. The original meaning is the rank of silk's superiority and inferiority, and the extension indicates the rank and rank.
humanum_full_description:
從「糸」，「及」聲。本義是絲的優劣次第，引申表示次第、等級。《說文》：「級，絲次弟也。从糸，及聲。」段玉裁注：「本謂絲之次弟，故其字从糸，引申為凡次弟之偁。」如《左傳．僖公二十三年》：「以伯舅耋老，加勞，賜一級，無下拜。」《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡155-156：「欲歸爵二級以免親父母為隸臣妾者一人者……許之，免以為庶人。」整理者翻譯為要求退還爵兩級，用來贖免現為隸臣的親生父母一人……可以允許，所贖的都免為庶人。

　　「級」表示石階、階級。《玉篇．系部》：「級，階級也。」如《禮記．曲禮上》：「主人與客讓登，主人先登，客從之，拾級聚足，連步以上。」《呂氏春秋．重言》：「乃令賓者延之而上，分級而立。」高誘注：「級，階陛。」

　　「級」可作量詞，古代用於計算砍下的人頭數量。《正字通．糸部》：「級，首級。秦法斬人首多者進爵一級，因謂之首級。」如《史記．趙世家》：「九年，與韓、魏共擊秦，秦敗我，斬首八萬級。」《漢書．趙充國辛慶忌傳》：「縱兵擊其種人，斬首千餘級。」
humanum_short_description: 從「糸」，「及」聲。本義是絲的優劣次第，引申表示次第、等級。

①層次：石級。拾級而上。
②等次：級別。級差。
③學校裏學生所在學年的分段：年級。級任。
④古代指戰時或用刑斬下的人頭：首級。
⑤量詞，用於臺階、樓梯：從一樓到三樓有四十多級臺階。

從「 糸 」，「 及 」聲。本義是絲的優劣次第，引申表示次第、等級。《說文》：「級，絲次弟也。从糸，及聲。」段玉裁注：「本謂絲之次弟，故其字从糸，引申為凡次弟之偁。」如《左傳．僖公二十三年》：「以伯舅耋老，加勞，賜一級，無下拜。」《睡虎地秦簡．秦律十八種》簡155-156：「欲歸爵二級以免親父母為隸臣妾者一人者……許之，免以為庶人。」整理者翻譯為要求退還爵兩級，用來贖免現為隸臣的親生父母一人……可以允許，所贖的都免為庶人。 「 級 」表示石階、階級。《玉篇．系部》：「級，階級也。」如《禮記．曲禮上》：「主人與客讓登，主人先登，客從之，拾級聚足，連步以上。」《呂氏春秋．重言》：「乃令賓者延之而上，分級而立。」高誘注：「級，階陛。」 「 級 」可作量詞，古代用於計算砍下的人頭數量。《正字通．糸部》：「級，首級。秦法斬人首多者進爵一級，因謂之首級。」如《史記．趙世家》：「九年，與韓、魏共擊秦，秦敗我，斬首八萬級。」《漢書．趙充國辛慶忌傳》：「縱兵擊其種人，斬首千餘級。」

級字的基本解释

級
jí
见“级”。

級字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》居立切，入緝，見。］
“级1”的繁体字。
(1)等第。特指官爵的品级。
(2)阶，磴。亦用作阶、磴的计量词。
(3)秦制，战争中斩敌首一，赐爵一级，称为首级。后以“级”为所斩之首的量词。
(4)指所斩之首。
[②]［zhuì］
“级2”的繁体字。同“綴1”。
缵列。

級字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　級； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页918第05
【廣韻】【正韻】居立切【集韻】訖立切，?音急。【說文】絲次第也。　又【玉篇】階級也。【廣韻】等級。俗作?。【禮·曲禮】拾級聚足。【註】級，等也。又【月令】貴賤之等級。【史記·秦始皇本紀】拜爵一級。　又【史記·樊噲傳】斬首十五級。

級字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
級字的起名意思

暂无。

level
Basic explanation of words
level
jí
See "level".
level
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jí］
["Guangyun" Ju Liqie, be arrested, see you. ]
"Level 1" in traditional characters.
(1) Ranking. Especially refer to the rank of the official.
(2) Order, Deng. It is also used as a measurement word for rank and deng.
(3) Qin system, beheading the enemy in the war, conferring a rank, called the first rank. After that, "level" was used as the quantifier to be beheaded.
(4) Refers to the beheaded head.
[②]［zhuì］
"Level 2" in traditional characters. Same as "fix 1".
缵列。

Name meaning

jí
вм. 级
Radicals: 糸, 及  (thread, escalator)
Meaning Mnemonic
There are pieces of thread on each escalator showing you what level they go to in your school. Each escalator takes you to a different grade, so make sure you follow the right thread or you'll end up in a class that's either way above or way below your level.
When you level up your Japanese skills, you'll take this escalator to rank up too!
Reading Mnemonic
You want to see what the highest level is, so you go up the wrong escalator. At the top you find a giant cucumber (きゅう).
A teacher comes over and says, "Excuse me, this is advanced level cucumber studies. I don't think you're at this level yet... please take the escalator down and follow the threads to find your level."

ノ, 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 及 (достигать), 糸 (нить)
